text: Craig Lyle Thomas; better known as Craig L. Thomas (February 17, 1933 â€“ June 4, 2007) was an American politician. He was a senior U.S. Senator from Wyoming and member of United States Republican Party. Before that he was a member of the United States House of Representatives for Wyoming from 1989 to 1995. Thomas died of leukemia on June 4, 2007 in Bethesda, Maryland, aged 74. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1933 births Category:2007 deaths Category:Deaths from leukemia Category:United States representatives from Wyoming Category:United States senators from Wyoming Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Craig L. Thomas
